textContent:
I don't know if I should be happy writing this or overwhelmed, cause "you think of our future together", sounds so good, but "you think of our future and know that we might not be together", hurts a lot! 
But we're only going to think positively and believe in what we've asked for in prayers!

I don't want you to be sad or anxious thinking about our future, if we're really in love, if we've really prayed for this, if we've been genuine with eachother, then God definitely has something in plan for us, cause meeting you (digitally), getting to know you, can't just go in vain, we've to make it work and we will ðŸ¥º  

And I want a life with you like this picture above ðŸ˜­ and I pray for it ðŸ¥º 

I love you Umair please don't be sad ðŸ¥ºðŸ©·
title: Open when you're thinking about our future.
textContentHtml:
I don't know if I should be happy writing this or overwhelmed, cause "you think of our future together", sounds so good, but "you think of our future and know that we might not be together", hurts a lot! 

But we're only going to think positively and believe in what we've asked for in prayers!


I don't want you to be sad or anxious thinking about our future, if we're really in love, if we've really prayed for this, if we've been genuine with eachother, then God definitely has something in plan for us, cause meeting you (digitally), getting to know you, can't just go in vain, we've to make it work and we will ðŸ¥º  


And I want a life with you like this picture above ðŸ˜­ and I pray for it ðŸ¥º 


I love you Umair please don't be sad ðŸ¥ºðŸ©·
